https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/umh4zuxGoEWuKwy2Sz7hHxFIzsy.jpg In the 1980 French countryside, farmer Jojo and his ill-tempered wife Lulu hate each other, though their respective interests speak against divorce. The only thing that keeps the oppressed Jojo from murder is the threat of the guillotine... A Crime in Paradise
